Original:
<>

自然酒近年已是不可抵擋的紅白酒新潮流，是一片再已經極度成熟紅白酒玩家市場中的新藍海。(你也可以說是一個反璞歸真的運動）台灣也同樣的往這片藍海中往前航行。

而在這藍海中最新的一個自然界新星，A.G.O.T -  A Glass or Two 是一個舒適的小空間，店內的裝飾擺設都可以看得出來女主人們的用心。一進入店面給人一種urban art & 輕奢風的視覺。打開門映入眼簾的層架上豐富的選擇，在三位老闆娘親切的介紹下卻不讓人感到無所適從不知如何選擇。在這裡可以品嚐到不同風味，風土，產區以及葡萄種類的自然派紅白橘酒。

如果你正在往自然派紅白酒的領域探索, 這裡絕對是一個適合你來開發的據點。

再者，必須要特別的推薦，AGOT 的配酒小食也是必配的嚴選餐點。 火烤brie cheese with maple bacon 跟酒的搭配一定會令你留戀往返。

身為一個愛喝的酒客， AGOT絕對會是自然派紅白酒界的新星之一。

This place is a natural gem on the rising trend!

相信你也會有相同的體驗
EN:
<>

Natural wine has been an irresistible new trend of red and white wine in recent years. It is a new blue ocean in the market that is already extremely mature.(You can also say that it is a exercise against the truth.) Taiwan also sails forward in this blue ocean.

In this latest natural star in the blue ocean, A.G.O.T -A Glass or Two is a comfortable small space. The decoration in the store can see the intentions of the hostess.As soon as you enter the store, it is given a vision of Urban ART & Light luxury.Open the rich choice on the shelf of the door, and the three boss ladies have a cordial introduction but do not make people feel at a loss unknown how to choose.Here you can taste different flavors, territory, production areas, and grapes.

If you are exploring the field of red and white wine in nature, it is definitely a stronghold that suits you to develop.

Furthermore, special recommendations must be recommended. AGOT's drinking snacks are also necessary to choose a strict meal.The combination of fire baking BRIE Cheese with MAPLE BACON will definitely make you nostalgic.

As a drinker who loves to drink, AGOT will definitely be one of the new stars in the red and white wine industry in nature.

This place is a natural gem on the rising trend!

I believe you will have the same experience

Original: 我在網路上找到了這家酒吧，並有很棒的推薦！當我開始享用杏仁無花果烤布里乾酪和蓬鬆甜甜圈時，我知道這將是一個美好的夜晚。我和我的朋友點了一杯漂亮的天然玫瑰，真是恰到好處。如果您正在尋找美好的夜晚、美酒和美食，那麼這裡無疑是一個舒適的地方。

Original:
我最近在巴黎旅行時接觸到了天然葡萄酒，所以當我得知有一家主要出售天然葡萄酒的酒吧時，我不得不親自去看看。

工作人員非常了解他們的葡萄酒產區和葡萄品種，以及白葡萄酒、橙葡萄酒、玫瑰葡萄酒和紅葡萄酒的真正定義。

這個地方還提供葡萄酒航班，以便您可以一次嘗試更多。

他們還有各種各樣的小吃，從奶酪到雞湯再到傳統的餃子（是的，它與天然葡萄酒搭配得很好）。

強烈推薦這個地方，他們從下午 3 點開始營業，適合像我這樣在一天中任何時間都喜歡葡萄酒的人。
EN:
I recently came into contact with natural wine while traveling in Paris, so when I learned that there was a bar that mainly sold natural wines, I had to see it in person.

The staff knows very much about their wine production areas and grape varieties, as well as the true definition of white wine, orange wine, rose wine and red wine.

This place also offers wine flights so that you can try more at a time.

They also have a variety of snacks, from cheese to chicken soup to traditional dumplings (yes, it is well matched with natural wine).

It is highly recommended for this place. They started business from 3 pm, suitable for people who like wine at any time like me at any time.

Original:
⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ 強烈推薦給當地人或任何來台北需要喝酒的地方！

一兩杯提供各種精選的天然葡萄酒。他們也為不喝酒的人提供非酒精飲料。食物非常美味。他們的食物菜單上有各種多樣化的菜餚。我點了很多菜來嘗試。他們都與他們的酒很相配。

這個空間正是葡萄酒愛好者所需要的。室內設計、空間設計、色彩、燈光，真正讓你有品酒的心情，遠離忙碌的生活，喝一杯紅/白酒慢慢享受夜晚。

在那裡工作的人都非常酷而且友善。他們真的知道自己在用葡萄酒做什麼。 5 顆星！

每當我再次來到台北，這將是我唯一去喝酒的地方。 5/5 顆星 ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐
EN:
⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ 烈 烈 strongly recommend it to the locals or any place where you need to drink in Taipei!

One or two cups provide a variety of selected natural wines.They also provide non -alcoholic beverages for people who don't drink.The food is very delicious.There are various dishes on their food menus.I ordered a lot of dishes to try.They all match their wine.

This space is exactly what wine lovers need.Indoor design, space design, color, and lighting really give you a mood of wine tasting, stay away from busy life, and drink a cup of red/white wine slowly to enjoy the night.

People who work there are very cool and friendly.They really know what they are using wine.5 stars!

Whenever I come to Taipei again, this will be the only place I go to drink.5/5 stars ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐

Original:
當我們下午想喝酒時去的地方。喜歡這裡的裝潢、精選的天然葡萄酒和周到的服務。只要將您的好惡告訴老闆娘，她就會為您帶來完美的葡萄酒。

The price of wine is slightly more expensive than the outside, but you are paying the price for the environment, so I will not complain!

Original:

For the first time, my husband and I came to drink for the first time, which left a deep impression on me.Our waiters are very friendly and knowledgeable.The atmosphere here is a high -end of leisure, with excellent design, wonderful music and friendly people.Food and wine are absolutely great.It's an extraordinary night!
So if I am you, if you are considering, I will definitely try this place, you will not be disappointed.

Original:
我最近參觀了 A Glass or Two 酒吧，並被他們精選的美味白酒所震撼。我在白葡萄酒套餐中點了三款葡萄酒，它們都獨特而美味，搭配的起司為這次體驗增添了額外的風味。

除了令人難以置信的葡萄酒之外，一兩杯餐廳友好且知識淵博的員工也給我留下了深刻的印象。他們能夠推薦最適合我口味的葡萄酒，並提供有關每種葡萄酒的風味特徵和產地的有用資訊。

一兩杯的價格也很合理，這是一個不錯的驚喜。酒吧的氣氛舒適宜人，氣氛溫馨輕鬆。

總的來說，我強烈推薦一兩杯，因為他們提供美味的葡萄酒選擇、知識淵博的員工和優惠的價格。五星！

I recently visited the A Glass or Two bar and was shocked by their selected delicious liquor.I ordered three wines in the white wine set. They were all unique and delicious. The matching cheese added additional flavor to this experience.

In addition to incredible wines, one or two cups of restaurants with friendly and knowledgeable employees also impressed me.They can recommend the wine that is most suitable for my taste and provide useful information about the flavor characteristics of each wine and useful information.

The price of one or two cups is also reasonable, which is a good surprise.The atmosphere of the bar is comfortable and pleasant, and the atmosphere is warm and relaxed.

In general, I strongly recommend one or two cups because they provide delicious wine selection, knowledgeable employees and preferential prices.Five stars!
